form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Kennedy (for himself and Mr. Cassidy) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To improve drought-related disaster assistance programs of the Department of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Crawfish Recovery Assistance from Weather Disasters And Droughts Act or the CRAWDAD Act.

section.header: Emergency assistance for livestock, honey bees, and farm-raised fish program
section.text: Section 1501(d) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9081(d)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1), by inserting drought, after adverse weather,;

subparagraph.text: by inserting adverse weather, drought, after disease,; and
by inserting and losses of crawfish harvest due to adverse weather or drought after cattle tick fever; and

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:
For purposes of this subsection, the Secretary, in consultation with eligible producers of farm-raised fish, shall establish a documentation standard for each of the following:

subparagraph.text: Production of crawfish, as related to reductions in harvest.
Defining loss conditions due to drought.

section.text: Section 1501(c)(1)(A)(i) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 9081(c)(1)(A)(i)) is amended, in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking means livestock and inserting means livestock, whether weaned or unweaned,.
